recordTypes.name: New Construction Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is for NEW ground up construction of a full structure.

recordTypes.name: Foundation ONLY Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is for a foundation to which the structure is still going through the approval process.

recordTypes.name: Addition/Alteration Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Applications included but not limited to: Additions, remodeling, decks, porches, sunrooms, awnings, accessory structures over 200sq.ft. in area, Fireplace inserts, chimney liners, Etc.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Electrical Permits include but are not limited to: General wiring, EV Chargers, Antenna, and Generators.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Plumbing permits include but are not limited to: General plumbing, gas piping, and Water Heaters.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Mechanical Permits include but are not limited to: Boiler, Furnace, Air Conditioning, Geothermal, Tank Installation (LP or Oil) and Hoods/Exhaust Venting.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for Roof or Ground Mounted Solar Arrays.  Both HIC and E1 licenses must be input into the application for a permit to be issued.

recordTypes.name: Roof Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for overlay or replacement Roofing.

recordTypes.name: Siding/Windows/Door Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for replacement of: Siding, Windows and Exterior Doors

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Applications - WestFarm Malls ONLY
Demolition Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Applications included but not limited to: UST Removal, Full / Partial Structure Demolition, & In Ground Pool Demolition.

categories.name: On Line Permit Applications
categories.content:
The Town of Farmington has, as of January 1, 2026, rolled out a newer permit process.

Please select the permit application which best fits your portion of work to be performed.
